title: Hotspot,wifi,simcard,sound not working. Its taking too much time loading taking photo or open settin
content: Last night i put my pixel 2 on charging using power bank, after when i wake up in the morning it is switched off.when i tried to start its not starting after sometime it automatically starts but sim card,hotspot,wi fi,sound was not working and it also taking too much time to load camera,clicking picture and in opening setting.i also reset the phone but even then its not working properly.kindly help me asap.
